text: Hey John, I've been feeling really anxious lately and I'm not sure how to deal with it. My baby has gone due to an accident - there is no way to make up for this. Haven't talked to Mark about this yet, but I needed to tell someone.
Can't wait for the art exhibit at Riverdale Gallery next weekend! It's going to be such a nice break from everything.
I'm so glad I have you to talk to, John. It's been tough, but I'm trying to stay positive.
I've been doing some painting to help with my anxiety. It's actually quite therapeutic.
I'm looking forward to our gallery trip. It's been a while since I've done something just for me.
